item.title: ELECTRONIC FLIGHT BAG (EFB) SYSTEM – CLASS 3 EFB (BOEING) – ONE SYSTEM INOPERATIVE

note.para: Any function, program or document which is operative may be used.

numlitem.para: The pilot with the inoperative EFB will use his or her paper manuals and charts in their flight kits or the ship's library.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected EFB Display Unit "___ EFB (functionality) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Document specific inoperative function in Aircraft Logbook.
